#
# Autogenerated from /export/home/dicuccio/cpp-cmake/cpp-cmake.2015-01-24/src/dbapi/driver/odbc/samples/Makefile.odbc_lang.app
#
add_executable(odbc_lang-app
    odbc_lang
)

set_target_properties(odbc_lang-app PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME odbc_lang)

include_directories(${ODBC_INCLUDE})

target_link_libraries(odbc_lang-app
    ncbi_xdbapi_odbc dbapi_driver ${XCONNEXT} xconnect ${ODBC_LIBS}
     
)
